EMPLOIS

Rejoignez notre équipe.

Nous recherchons toujours des personnes passionnées qui partagent notre vision et notre enthousiasme pour ce qui est possible. Si ce que Group Income crée et représente vous intéresse sincèrement, vous pourriez vouloir rejoindre notre équipe.

Postes ouverts

Grant Writer à distance Social Media Marketer à distance Volunteering & Bounties à distance

Social Media Marketer

We’re looking for a “professional sh*t poster” who’s great with social media to post a few times per day in reaction to various project-related events in a semi-professional (but humorous) manner and engage with the community.

Required Attributes
  1. Loves the idea of Group Income and is excited about what we’re doing.
  2. People person. Happy to interact in a positive way with the community.
  3. Funny, Talented, and Creative.
  4. Are able to manage multiple social network accounts, at least on Fediverse, X, and BlueSky.
Compensation
  • Negotiated hourly rate paid in cryptocurrency.
What to expect
  1. Use the nav bar to look through the pages on this website (maybe watch some videos, read some posts). Decide whether this project excites you. We’re only looking for people who are genuinely interested/excited in what we’re creating.
  2. Proceed to Application Instructions below and apply as soon as you can.

Application Instructions

  • Send an email to hi@okturtles.org telling us:

    1. Your marketing background, including examples of past work.
    2. Why you think you’d be good at this job.
    3. What, if anything, you think you might have trouble with (be honest).
    4. Link(s) to portfolio(s) or work, if you have any.
    5. Any questions/concerns you have.
    6. 3 real examples of any type of marketing content you’d make for us (whether it’s a tweet, an AI video, a song, a blog post, a reaction to some current event, whatever).
    7. How soon you’ll be able to start.

  • Install Keybase and send a copy of that email to greg.

Please follow all instructions if you’d like a reply.

We should respond back within a week or so of receiving your application (depending on how many responses we’ve received so far).
